title: CS 564 and CS 537 workload
body: Does anyone know what the workload would be like for taking these courses at the same time? How many projects are there for each course? What are the projects like?
comments: CS 537 is one of those classes that rapidly scales in difficulty/effort the worse you are.
I would also like to know the workload for 564

I am currently in CS 564 and the workload is very manageable. There are only 6 assignments this semester (3 problem sets, 3 projects). The projects took 4-5 hours, and the problem sets took 2-3 hours.
